_header: O gentle Fortune I thank you iwis
_description: A lover’s good fortune — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC652.First Lines:
O gentyll fortune I thonke yowe I wysthat yhe me lyste haue
                    preferre so…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…she hath ynowe and is well famedof ryght gode altherbest
                    ynamed
CamTCC652.Editions:
Wilson,  Kenneth George. 
             The Complaint against Hope.
         Ann Arbor: University of Michigan, 1957: 20.
